name: Marine Corps Ranger - Maverick Antiwar Sniper
name_original: Marine Corps Ranger - Maverick Antiwar Sniper
description:
Commander Ralf has been assigned a task to capture and behead the criminals in this mountain train sniper shooting adventure game.

Group of ill mined criminals and gangsters are guarding a train which is on its way to leave the country, the money on the train will be utilized to purchase new weaponry, arms, rifles, drugs and other deadly guns and ammunition. Commander Ralf is the last hope, to capture all the criminals and bring them to justice, to save the county.

Get into the avatar of Mountain Sniper with one mission - Kill'em All

Gameplay
- Four intense level of shooting experience
- Kill all 10 snipers hiding in the train
- Save the train from the loot
- Bring glory to your country
- Kill them all from mountain
- Great FPS display
